participants.name: Nicko Vanegas
participants.url: In a relationship with Ray Mejia

messages.message:
Brian
You are all friending me and I am realizing my ambition!
That Is amazing.

Brian
I want to trend. Without being a celebrity.
Probably if you do a sex tape and "accidentally" leak It on the internet.

Brian
lol  good idea. Not exactly kid appropriate but I can see where you are coming from.  Plus they already did that, so I doubt it will work for much longer, everyone will have their own sex tapes soon.
That is true. So if you do it you gotta be creative and do something unique so your tape will stand out. This is the right time because then like you said it will be to mainstream and won't work.

Brian
Preempt the market?  Good thinking.  How else can I do it?  Appeal to a bunch of atheists to make me their leader?

Ooh atheist are tricky, they like you if you pretend to be religious with the mere purpose to mock religion but if you are to commited to it they will hate you because they will question your atheism. Atheists are like that malibu mom that had to have everything glutten free not because of glutten allergy but more like a reason to brag and rub it in your face the fact that she's "better" than anyone else.
Pretty tricky stuff.

Brian
Woah.  That is understanding, thank you so much!
You're welcome. Anytime.

Brian

Case in point!
That's fantastic. I love your devotion.

Brian
Cool huh?
Totally cool.

Brian
Here's another one:

I can teach you to do it too.  Question everything!  Act like someone is wrong and politely try to get to the bottom of it.  Especially on your families politics posts, we have to start changing people's minds.  Stay positive and spread the love!
I assume that everything is a waste of time given limitless human ambition.
Hehe. Oh my, I'm loving the way you are thinking. Is quite witty and clever.

Brian
Haha, it's all about mindset!
https://www.gatesnotes.com/Books/Mindset-The-New-Psychology-of-Success
What You Believe Affects What You Achieve
Bill Gates reviews the book “Mindset” by author Carol Dweck.
gatesnotes.com
I'm definitely going to buy it.

Brian
I think it would be worth it if Bill Gates is recommending it.
can I post this last part of our chat?
Of course. I do not mind.

Brian
I am going to use it as evidence that my ambition transcends me because I am holding you accountable to learn new knowledge!  
I wonder how it will go over with the admins.
Alright. Trust me if I see it I'll give you my support.

Brian
Haha, posted to atheist beings.
I noticed. Way to go.

Brian
lol one guy told me to talk to someone else after friending me, so I messaged a few people and asked how they know this guy and then asked him if it worked.  Hopefully they will get in touch with him and wonder who I am.  That will lead him back to me, he told me to get a life.  5 minutes well spent, lol
Good. Probably you are creating a domino effect.

Brian
Exactly.  if that guy is so upset to tell me to "go away" so quickly, he probably needs someone to talk to.  Who else is lurking in the corners that needs talking to?
There's a lot of people out there. I would say everyone yea everyone needs someone to talk everyone feels misunderstood.

Brian
Especially with how impersonal FB is, people are seeking and they are receiving.  Too much noise.  I am the filter.
They just dont know what they want. And they are to affraid to give the chance to someone who's to different or to polarized

Brian
PERFECT! I have to show them there are so many gray areas, I can have the same mindset as them, and be different at the same time.  Good idea for mind control, I am putting that in my calendar.
If you need a job when you are older, don't be afraid to reach out.

Is better not to postpone it and take aggressive actions.
Definitely for sure i'll reach out. If I'm not to busy.

Brian
Don't have time to postpone.
I am talking faster than Facebook can load.
That's always a problem

Brian
I got removed from admin.  Just like you said.  You must be a fortune teller 
Really interesting Mike Mitchell jumped to defending himself and that post didn't even mention god anywhere.
Maybe somehow it got touchy for him. One of those "if the shoe fits"  kind of post.

Brian
Yeah.  People are often touchy on this subject.  That is exactly why I chose to start with this forum.
Might help to only use lower case in the word god.  I've noticed people are less defensive and it reminds me of someone teasing  "Haha he even uses a capital letter"  I wonder where I first read that, seems important.

I really don't know if they are skeptics about god or they really want to believe that there isn't one. If they really didn't believe they wouldn't get so heated about something that they dont really believe on. Idk if that makes any sense.

Brian
Yeah I agree completely.  To me it doesn't matter what they believe, this is all just a test.  But if I can use it to say something nice to someone on a personal level.  I am better at marketing than FB is.
Personal level? That is tough. People get so defensive when you are nice to them in a personal level. I think just with gradual moderation. Formality is always a good start.

Brian
yeah I think my post just got removed.
Too personal.  Someone reported me.
Something is wrong.  I am still getting notifications but I can't see it.

Brian
Too personal.  Someone reported me.
Something is wrong.  I am still getting notifications but I can't see it.
Really? That is so bullshit.

Brian
Agree.
Idk. Im still seeing your post.

Brian
Ha!  Maybe I am blocked?
I also check the member list and you were there.

Brian
Yeah, something is wrong.
Maybe the FB admins are members?
I should find them on Linked in and friend them so they can see my ambitions.
Yeah. I think after they get to know you better they'll be more sensible about it.

Brian
Nicko you are wise for your years.  Good ideas.

Brian
https://www.generosity.com/emergencies-fundraising/send-brian-and-iga-to-tahiti-for-great-success--2/x/15204496
Send Brian and Iga to Tahiti for great success!
Support 'Send Brian and Iga to Tahiti for great success!' by donating or sharing today!
generosity.com
What do you think?
Yeah.

Brian
Too negative?

Brian
How's life?
Pretty good.  how about you?

Brian
Good. Working on automation.
interesting
